examples: They drank in every word of the lecture.
I stopped for a while to drink in the beauty of the scene.
Join us for a celebratory drink in the bar.
Her husband poisoned her drink in order to kill her.
Coffee is probably the most popular drink in the world.
He grudgingly agreed to have a drink in a hotel close by.
